data.comment: Mathias Jensen (Brentford) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Emiliano Marcondes.
In the minute 37, Goal! Birmingham have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Jeremie Bela.
Ivan Sanchez with an assist there.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Christian Norgaard has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ivan Sunjic (Birmingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 67, Birmingham make their first substitution with Dan Crowley replacing Jon Toral.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second change, with Marcus Forss replacing the possibly injured Sergi Canos.
Kristian Pedersen (Birmingham) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, Adan George is replacing Ivan Sanchez for the home team.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a third substitution, with Tarique Fosu replacing Emiliano Marcondes.
Adam Clayton for Birmingham has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team replace Lukas Jutkiewicz with Gary Gardner.
